4138 using results_t = std::vector<std::string>;
4140 using callback_t = std::function<bool(const results_t &)>;
4141 
4142 class Option;
4143 class App;
4144 
4145 using Option_p = std::unique_ptr<Option>;
4147 enum class MultiOptionPolicy : char {
4148  Throw,
4149  TakeLast,
4150  TakeFirst,
4151  Join,
4152  TakeAll,
4153  Sum
4154 };
4155 
4158 template <typename CRTP> class OptionBase {
4159  friend App;
4160 
4161  protected:
4163  std::string group_ = std::string("Options");
4164 
4166  bool required_{false};
4167 
4169  bool ignore_case_{false};
4170 
4172  bool ignore_underscore_{false};
4173 
4175  bool configurable_{true};
4176 
4178  bool disable_flag_override_{false};
4179 
4181  char delimiter_{'\0'};
4182 
4184  bool always_capture_default_{false};
4185 
4187  MultiOptionPolicy multi_option_policy_{MultiOptionPolicy::Throw};
4188 
4190  template <typename T> void copy_to(T *other) const;
4191 
4192  public:
4193  // setters
4194 
4196  CRTP *group(const std::string &name) {
4197  if(!detail::valid_alias_name_string(name)) {
4198  throw IncorrectConstruction("Group names may not contain newlines or null characters");
4199  }
4200  group_ = name;
4201  return static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4202  }
4203 
4205  CRTP *required(bool value = true) {
4206  required_ = value;
4207  return static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4208  }
4209 
4211  CRTP *mandatory(bool value = true) { return required(value); }
4212 
4213  CRTP *always_capture_default(bool value = true) {
4214  always_capture_default_ = value;
4215  return static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4216  }
4217 
4218  // Getters
4219 
4221  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_group() const { return group_; }
4222 
4224  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_required() const { return required_; }
4225 
4227  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_ignore_case() const { return ignore_case_; }
4228 
4230  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_ignore_underscore() const { return ignore_underscore_; }
4231 
4233  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_configurable() const { return configurable_; }
4234 
4236  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_disable_flag_override() const { return disable_flag_override_; }
4237 
4239  CLI11_NODISCARD char get_delimiter() const { return delimiter_; }
4240 
4242  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_always_capture_default() const { return always_capture_default_; }
4243 
4245  CLI11_NODISCARD MultiOptionPolicy get_multi_option_policy() const { return multi_option_policy_; }
4246 
4247  // Shortcuts for multi option policy
4248 
4250  CRTP *take_last() {
4251  auto *self = static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4252  self->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast);
4253  return self;
4254  }
4255 
4257  CRTP *take_first() {
4258  auto *self = static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4259  self->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeFirst);
4260  return self;
4261  }
4262 
4264  CRTP *take_all() {
4265  auto self = static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4266  self->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeAll);
4267  return self;
4268  }
4269 
4271  CRTP *join() {
4272  auto *self = static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4273  self->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::Join);
4274  return self;
4275  }
4276 
4278  CRTP *join(char delim) {
4279  auto self = static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4280  self->delimiter_ = delim;
4281  self->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::Join);
4282  return self;
4283  }
4284 
4286  CRTP *configurable(bool value = true) {
4287  configurable_ = value;
4288  return static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4289  }
4290 
4292  CRTP *delimiter(char value = '\0') {
4293  delimiter_ = value;
4294  return static_cast<CRTP *>(this);
4295  }
4296 };
4297 
4300 class OptionDefaults : public OptionBase<OptionDefaults> {
4301  public:
4302  OptionDefaults() = default;
4303 
4304  // Methods here need a different implementation if they are Option vs. OptionDefault
4305 
4307  OptionDefaults *multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy value = MultiOptionPolicy::Throw) {
4308  multi_option_policy_ = value;
4309  return this;
4310  }
4311 
4313  OptionDefaults *ignore_case(bool value = true) {
4314  ignore_case_ = value;
4315  return this;
4316  }
4317 
4319  OptionDefaults *ignore_underscore(bool value = true) {
4320  ignore_underscore_ = value;
4321  return this;
4322  }
4323 
4325  OptionDefaults *disable_flag_override(bool value = true) {
4326  disable_flag_override_ = value;
4327  return this;
4328  }
4329 
4331  OptionDefaults *delimiter(char value = '\0') {
4332  delimiter_ = value;
4333  return this;
4334  }
4335 };
4336 
4337 class Option : public OptionBase<Option> {
4338  friend App;
4339 
4340  protected:
4343 
4345  std::vector<std::string> snames_{};
4346 
4348  std::vector<std::string> lnames_{};
4349 
4352  std::vector<std::pair<std::string, std::string>> default_flag_values_{};
4353 
4355  std::vector<std::string> fnames_{};
4356 
4358  std::string pname_{};
4359 
4361  std::string envname_{};
4362 
4366 
4368  std::string description_{};
4369 
4371  std::string default_str_{};
4372 
4374  std::string option_text_{};
4375 
4379  std::function<std::string()> type_name_{[]() { return std::string(); }};
4380 
4382  std::function<std::string()> default_function_{};
4383 
4387 
4390  int type_size_max_{1};
4392  int type_size_min_{1};
4393 
4395  int expected_min_{1};
4397  int expected_max_{1};
4398 
4400  std::vector<Validator> validators_{};
4401 
4403  std::set<Option *> needs_{};
4404 
4406  std::set<Option *> excludes_{};
4407 
4411 
4413  App *parent_{nullptr};
4414 
4416  callback_t callback_{};
4417 
4421 
4423  results_t results_{};
4425  results_t proc_results_{};
4427  enum class option_state : char {
4428  parsing = 0,
4429  validated = 2,
4430  reduced = 4,
4431  callback_run = 6,
4432  };
4434  option_state current_option_state_{option_state::parsing};
4436  bool allow_extra_args_{false};
4438  bool flag_like_{false};
4440  bool run_callback_for_default_{false};
4442  bool inject_separator_{false};
4444  bool trigger_on_result_{false};
4446  bool force_callback_{false};
4448 
4450  Option(std::string option_name, std::string option_description, callback_t callback, App *parent)
4451  : description_(std::move(option_description)), parent_(parent), callback_(std::move(callback)) {
4452  std::tie(snames_, lnames_, pname_) = detail::get_names(detail::split_names(option_name));
4453  }
4454 
4455  public:
4458 
4459  Option(const Option &) = delete;
4460  Option &operator=(const Option &) = delete;
4461 
4463  CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t count() const { return results_.size(); }
4464 
4466  CLI11_NODISCARD bool empty() const { return results_.empty(); }
4467 
4469  explicit operator bool() const { return !empty() || force_callback_; }
4470 
4472  void clear() {
4473  results_.clear();
4474  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
4475  }
4476 
4480 
4482  Option *expected(int value);
4483 
4485  Option *expected(int value_min, int value_max);
4486 
4489  Option *allow_extra_args(bool value = true) {
4490  allow_extra_args_ = value;
4491  return this;
4492  }
4494  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_allow_extra_args() const { return allow_extra_args_; }
4496  Option *trigger_on_parse(bool value = true) {
4497  trigger_on_result_ = value;
4498  return this;
4499  }
4501  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_trigger_on_parse() const { return trigger_on_result_; }
4502 
4504  Option *force_callback(bool value = true) {
4505  force_callback_ = value;
4506  return this;
4507  }
4509  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_force_callback() const { return force_callback_; }
4510 
4513  Option *run_callback_for_default(bool value = true) {
4514  run_callback_for_default_ = value;
4515  return this;
4516  }
4518  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_run_callback_for_default() const { return run_callback_for_default_; }
4519 
4521  Option *check(Validator validator, const std::string &validator_name = "");
4522 
4524  Option *check(std::function<std::string(const std::string &)> Validator,
4525  std::string Validator_description = "",
4526  std::string Validator_name = "");
4527 
4529  Option *transform(Validator Validator, const std::string &Validator_name = "");
4530 
4532  Option *transform(const std::function<std::string(std::string)> &func,
4533  std::string transform_description = "",
4534  std::string transform_name = "");
4535 
4537  Option *each(const std::function<void(std::string)> &func);
4538 
4540  Validator *get_validator(const std::string &Validator_name = "");
4541 
4543  Validator *get_validator(int index);
4544 
4546  Option *needs(Option *opt) {
4547  if(opt != this) {
4548  needs_.insert(opt);
4549  }
4550  return this;
4551  }
4552 
4554  template <typename T = App> Option *needs(std::string opt_name) {
4555  auto opt = static_cast<T *>(parent_)->get_option_no_throw(opt_name);
4556  if(opt == nullptr) {
4557  throw IncorrectConstruction::MissingOption(opt_name);
4558  }
4559  return needs(opt);
4560  }
4561 
4563  template <typename A, typename B, typename... ARG> Option *needs(A opt, B opt1, ARG... args) {
4564  needs(opt);
4565  return needs(opt1, args...); // NOLINT(readability-suspicious-call-argument)
4566  }
4567 
4569  bool remove_needs(Option *opt);
4570 
4572  Option *excludes(Option *opt);
4573 
4575  template <typename T = App> Option *excludes(std::string opt_name) {
4576  auto opt = static_cast<T *>(parent_)->get_option_no_throw(opt_name);
4577  if(opt == nullptr) {
4578  throw IncorrectConstruction::MissingOption(opt_name);
4579  }
4580  return excludes(opt);
4581  }
4582 
4584  template <typename A, typename B, typename... ARG> Option *excludes(A opt, B opt1, ARG... args) {
4585  excludes(opt);
4586  return excludes(opt1, args...);
4587  }
4588 
4590  bool remove_excludes(Option *opt);
4591 
4593  Option *envname(std::string name) {
4594  envname_ = std::move(name);
4595  return this;
4596  }
4597 
4602  template <typename T = App> Option *ignore_case(bool value = true);
4603 
4608  template <typename T = App> Option *ignore_underscore(bool value = true);
4609 
4611  Option *multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy value = MultiOptionPolicy::Throw);
4612 
4614  Option *disable_flag_override(bool value = true) {
4615  disable_flag_override_ = value;
4616  return this;
4617  }
4621 
4623  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_type_size() const { return type_size_min_; }
4624 
4626  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_type_size_min() const { return type_size_min_; }
4628  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_type_size_max() const { return type_size_max_; }
4629 
4631  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_inject_separator() const { return inject_separator_; }
4632 
4634  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_envname() const { return envname_; }
4635 
4637  CLI11_NODISCARD std::set<Option *> get_needs() const { return needs_; }
4638 
4640  CLI11_NODISCARD std::set<Option *> get_excludes() const { return excludes_; }
4641 
4643  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_default_str() const { return default_str_; }
4644 
4646  CLI11_NODISCARD callback_t get_callback() const { return callback_; }
4647 
4649  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::vector<std::string> &get_lnames() const { return lnames_; }
4650 
4652  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::vector<std::string> &get_snames() const { return snames_; }
4653 
4655  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::vector<std::string> &get_fnames() const { return fnames_; }
4657  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_single_name() const {
4658  if(!lnames_.empty()) {
4659  return lnames_[0];
4660  }
4661  if(!pname_.empty()) {
4662  return pname_;
4663  }
4664  if(!snames_.empty()) {
4665  return snames_[0];
4666  }
4667  return envname_;
4668  }
4670  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_expected() const { return expected_min_; }
4671 
4673  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_expected_min() const { return expected_min_; }
4675  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_expected_max() const { return expected_max_; }
4676 
4678  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_items_expected_min() const { return type_size_min_ * expected_min_; }
4679 
4681  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_items_expected_max() const {
4682  int t = type_size_max_;
4683  return detail::checked_multiply(t, expected_max_) ? t : detail::expected_max_vector_size;
4684  }
4686  CLI11_NODISCARD int get_items_expected() const { return get_items_expected_min(); }
4687 
4689  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_positional() const { return pname_.length() > 0; }
4690 
4692  CLI11_NODISCARD bool nonpositional() const { return (snames_.size() + lnames_.size()) > 0; }
4693 
4695  CLI11_NODISCARD bool has_description() const { return description_.length() > 0; }
4696 
4698  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_description() const { return description_; }
4699 
4701  Option *description(std::string option_description) {
4702  description_ = std::move(option_description);
4703  return this;
4704  }
4705 
4706  Option *option_text(std::string text) {
4707  option_text_ = std::move(text);
4708  return this;
4709  }
4710 
4711  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_option_text() const { return option_text_; }
4712 
4716 
4721  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_name(bool positional = false,
4722  bool all_options = false
4723  ) const;
4724 
4728 
4730  void run_callback();
4731 
4733  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &matching_name(const Option &other) const;
4734 
4736  bool operator==(const Option &other) const { return !matching_name(other).empty(); }
4737 
4739  CLI11_NODISCARD bool check_name(const std::string &name) const;
4740 
4742  CLI11_NODISCARD bool check_sname(std::string name) const {
4743  return (detail::find_member(std::move(name), snames_, ignore_case_) >= 0);
4744  }
4745 
4747  CLI11_NODISCARD bool check_lname(std::string name) const {
4748  return (detail::find_member(std::move(name), lnames_, ignore_case_, ignore_underscore_) >= 0);
4749  }
4750 
4752  CLI11_NODISCARD bool check_fname(std::string name) const {
4753  if(fnames_.empty()) {
4754  return false;
4755  }
4756  return (detail::find_member(std::move(name), fnames_, ignore_case_, ignore_underscore_) >= 0);
4757  }
4758 
4761  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_flag_value(const std::string &name, std::string input_value) const;
4762 
4764  Option *add_result(std::string s);
4765 
4767  Option *add_result(std::string s, int &results_added);
4768 
4770  Option *add_result(std::vector<std::string> s);
4771 
4773  CLI11_NODISCARD const results_t &results() const { return results_; }
4774 
4776  CLI11_NODISCARD results_t reduced_results() const;
4777 
4779  template <typename T> void results(T &output) const {
4780  bool retval = false;
4781  if(current_option_state_ >= option_state::reduced || (results_.size() == 1 && validators_.empty())) {
4782  const results_t &res = (proc_results_.empty()) ? results_ : proc_results_;
4783  retval = detail::lexical_conversion<T, T>(res, output);
4784  } else {
4785  results_t res;
4786  if(results_.empty()) {
4787  if(!default_str_.empty()) {
4788  // _add_results takes an rvalue only
4789  _add_result(std::string(default_str_), res);
4790  _validate_results(res);
4791  results_t extra;
4792  _reduce_results(extra, res);
4793  if(!extra.empty()) {
4794  res = std::move(extra);
4795  }
4796  } else {
4797  res.emplace_back();
4798  }
4799  } else {
4800  res = reduced_results();
4801  }
4802  retval = detail::lexical_conversion<T, T>(res, output);
4803  }
4804  if(!retval) {
4805  throw ConversionError(get_name(), results_);
4806  }
4807  }
4808 
4810  template <typename T> CLI11_NODISCARD T as() const {
4811  T output;
4812  results(output);
4813  return output;
4814  }
4815 
4817  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_callback_run() const { return (current_option_state_ == option_state::callback_run); }
4818 
4822 
4824  Option *type_name_fn(std::function<std::string()> typefun) {
4825  type_name_ = std::move(typefun);
4826  return this;
4827  }
4828 
4830  Option *type_name(std::string typeval) {
4831  type_name_fn([typeval]() { return typeval; });
4832  return this;
4833  }
4834 
4836  Option *type_size(int option_type_size);
4837 
4839  Option *type_size(int option_type_size_min, int option_type_size_max);
4840 
4842  void inject_separator(bool value = true) { inject_separator_ = value; }
4843 
4845  Option *default_function(const std::function<std::string()> &func) {
4846  default_function_ = func;
4847  return this;
4848  }
4849 
4851  Option *capture_default_str() {
4852  if(default_function_) {
4853  default_str_ = default_function_();
4854  }
4855  return this;
4856  }
4857 
4859  Option *default_str(std::string val) {
4860  default_str_ = std::move(val);
4861  return this;
4862  }
4863 
4866  template <typename X> Option *default_val(const X &val) {
4867  std::string val_str = detail::to_string(val);
4868  auto old_option_state = current_option_state_;
4869  results_t old_results{std::move(results_)};
4870  results_.clear();
4871  try {
4872  add_result(val_str);
4873  // if trigger_on_result_ is set the callback already ran
4874  if(run_callback_for_default_ && !trigger_on_result_) {
4875  run_callback(); // run callback sets the state, we need to reset it again
4876  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
4877  } else {
4878  _validate_results(results_);
4879  current_option_state_ = old_option_state;
4880  }
4881  } catch(const CLI::Error &) {
4882  // this should be done
4883  results_ = std::move(old_results);
4884  current_option_state_ = old_option_state;
4885  throw;
4886  }
4887  results_ = std::move(old_results);
4888  default_str_ = std::move(val_str);
4889  return this;
4890  }
4891 
4893  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_type_name() const;
4894 
4895  private:
4897  void _validate_results(results_t &res) const;
4898 
4902  void _reduce_results(results_t &out, const results_t &original) const;
4903 
4904  // Run a result through the Validators
4905  std::string _validate(std::string &result, int index) const;
4906 
4908  int _add_result(std::string &&result, std::vector<std::string> &res) const;
4909 };
4910 
4911 
4912 
4913 
4914 template <typename CRTP> template <typename T> void OptionBase<CRTP>::copy_to(T *other) const {
4915  other->group(group_);
4916  other->required(required_);
4917  other->ignore_case(ignore_case_);
4918  other->ignore_underscore(ignore_underscore_);
4919  other->configurable(configurable_);
4920  other->disable_flag_override(disable_flag_override_);
4921  other->delimiter(delimiter_);
4922  other->always_capture_default(always_capture_default_);
4923  other->multi_option_policy(multi_option_policy_);
4924 }
4925 
4926 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::expected(int value) {
4927  if(value < 0) {
4928  expected_min_ = -value;
4929  if(expected_max_ < expected_min_) {
4930  expected_max_ = expected_min_;
4931  }
4932  allow_extra_args_ = true;
4933  flag_like_ = false;
4934  } else if(value == detail::expected_max_vector_size) {
4935  expected_min_ = 1;
4936  expected_max_ = detail::expected_max_vector_size;
4937  allow_extra_args_ = true;
4938  flag_like_ = false;
4939  } else {
4940  expected_min_ = value;
4941  expected_max_ = value;
4942  flag_like_ = (expected_min_ == 0);
4943  }
4944  return this;
4945 }
4946 
4947 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::expected(int value_min, int value_max) {
4948  if(value_min < 0) {
4949  value_min = -value_min;
4950  }
4951 
4952  if(value_max < 0) {
4953  value_max = detail::expected_max_vector_size;
4954  }
4955  if(value_max < value_min) {
4956  expected_min_ = value_max;
4957  expected_max_ = value_min;
4958  } else {
4959  expected_max_ = value_max;
4960  expected_min_ = value_min;
4961  }
4962 
4963  return this;
4964 }
4965 
4966 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::check(Validator validator, const std::string &validator_name) {
4967  validator.non_modifying();
4968  validators_.push_back(std::move(validator));
4969  if(!validator_name.empty())
4970  validators_.back().name(validator_name);
4971  return this;
4972 }
4973 
4974 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::check(std::function<std::string(const std::string &)> Validator,
4975  std::string Validator_description,
4976  std::string Validator_name) {
4977  validators_.emplace_back(Validator, std::move(Validator_description), std::move(Validator_name));
4978  validators_.back().non_modifying();
4979  return this;
4980 }
4981 
4982 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::transform(Validator Validator, const std::string &Validator_name) {
4983  validators_.insert(validators_.begin(), std::move(Validator));
4984  if(!Validator_name.empty())
4985  validators_.front().name(Validator_name);
4986  return this;
4987 }
4988 
4989 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::transform(const std::function<std::string(std::string)> &func,
4990  std::string transform_description,
4991  std::string transform_name) {
4992  validators_.insert(validators_.begin(),
4993  Validator(
4994  [func](std::string &val) {
4995  val = func(val);
4996  return std::string{};
4997  },
4998  std::move(transform_description),
4999  std::move(transform_name)));
5000 
5001  return this;
5002 }
5003 
5004 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::each(const std::function<void(std::string)> &func) {
5005  validators_.emplace_back(
5006  [func](std::string &inout) {
5007  func(inout);
5008  return std::string{};
5009  },
5010  std::string{});
5011  return this;
5012 }
5013 
5014 CLI11_INLINE Validator *Option::get_validator(const std::string &Validator_name) {
5015  for(auto &Validator : validators_) {
5016  if(Validator_name == Validator.get_name()) {
5017  return &Validator;
5018  }
5019  }
5020  if((Validator_name.empty()) && (!validators_.empty())) {
5021  return &(validators_.front());
5022  }
5023  throw OptionNotFound(std::string{"Validator "} + Validator_name + " Not Found");
5024 }
5025 
5026 CLI11_INLINE Validator *Option::get_validator(int index) {
5027  // This is an signed int so that it is not equivalent to a pointer.
5028  if(index >= 0 && index < static_cast<int>(validators_.size())) {
5029  return &(validators_[static_cast<decltype(validators_)::size_type>(index)]);
5030  }
5031  throw OptionNotFound("Validator index is not valid");
5032 }
5033 
5034 CLI11_INLINE bool Option::remove_needs(Option *opt) {
5035  auto iterator = std::find(std::begin(needs_), std::end(needs_), opt);
5036 
5037  if(iterator == std::end(needs_)) {
5038  return false;
5039  }
5040  needs_.erase(iterator);
5041  return true;
5042 }
5043 
5044 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::excludes(Option *opt) {
5045  if(opt == this) {
5046  throw(IncorrectConstruction("and option cannot exclude itself"));
5047  }
5048  excludes_.insert(opt);
5049 
5050  // Help text should be symmetric - excluding a should exclude b
5051  opt->excludes_.insert(this);
5052 
5053  // Ignoring the insert return value, excluding twice is now allowed.
5054  // (Mostly to allow both directions to be excluded by user, even though the library does it for you.)
5055 
5056  return this;
5057 }
5058 
5059 CLI11_INLINE bool Option::remove_excludes(Option *opt) {
5060  auto iterator = std::find(std::begin(excludes_), std::end(excludes_), opt);
5061 
5062  if(iterator == std::end(excludes_)) {
5063  return false;
5064  }
5065  excludes_.erase(iterator);
5066  return true;
5067 }
5068 
5069 template <typename T> Option *Option::ignore_case(bool value) {
5070  if(!ignore_case_ && value) {
5071  ignore_case_ = value;
5072  auto *parent = static_cast<T *>(parent_);
5073  for(const Option_p &opt : parent->options_) {
5074  if(opt.get() == this) {
5075  continue;
5076  }
5077  const auto &omatch = opt->matching_name(*this);
5078  if(!omatch.empty()) {
5079  ignore_case_ = false;
5080  throw OptionAlreadyAdded("adding ignore case caused a name conflict with " + omatch);
5081  }
5082  }
5083  } else {
5084  ignore_case_ = value;
5085  }
5086  return this;
5087 }
5088 
5089 template <typename T> Option *Option::ignore_underscore(bool value) {
5090 
5091  if(!ignore_underscore_ && value) {
5092  ignore_underscore_ = value;
5093  auto *parent = static_cast<T *>(parent_);
5094  for(const Option_p &opt : parent->options_) {
5095  if(opt.get() == this) {
5096  continue;
5097  }
5098  const auto &omatch = opt->matching_name(*this);
5099  if(!omatch.empty()) {
5100  ignore_underscore_ = false;
5101  throw OptionAlreadyAdded("adding ignore underscore caused a name conflict with " + omatch);
5102  }
5103  }
5104  } else {
5105  ignore_underscore_ = value;
5106  }
5107  return this;
5108 }
5109 
5110 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy value) {
5111  if(value != multi_option_policy_) {
5112  if(multi_option_policy_ == MultiOptionPolicy::Throw && expected_max_ == detail::expected_max_vector_size &&
5113  expected_min_ > 1) { // this bizarre condition is to maintain backwards compatibility
5114  // with the previous behavior of expected_ with vectors
5115  expected_max_ = expected_min_;
5116  }
5117  multi_option_policy_ = value;
5118  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
5119  }
5120  return this;
5121 }
5122 
5123 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string Option::get_name(bool positional, bool all_options) const {
5124  if(get_group().empty())
5125  return {}; // Hidden
5126 
5127  if(all_options) {
5128 
5129  std::vector<std::string> name_list;
5130 
5132  if((positional && (!pname_.empty())) || (snames_.empty() && lnames_.empty())) {
5133  name_list.push_back(pname_);
5134  }
5135  if((get_items_expected() == 0) && (!fnames_.empty())) {
5136  for(const std::string &sname : snames_) {
5137  name_list.push_back("-" + sname);
5138  if(check_fname(sname)) {
5139  name_list.back() += "{" + get_flag_value(sname, "") + "}";
5140  }
5141  }
5142 
5143  for(const std::string &lname : lnames_) {
5144  name_list.push_back("--" + lname);
5145  if(check_fname(lname)) {
5146  name_list.back() += "{" + get_flag_value(lname, "") + "}";
5147  }
5148  }
5149  } else {
5150  for(const std::string &sname : snames_)
5151  name_list.push_back("-" + sname);
5152 
5153  for(const std::string &lname : lnames_)
5154  name_list.push_back("--" + lname);
5155  }
5156 
5157  return detail::join(name_list);
5158  }
5159 
5160  // This returns the positional name no matter what
5161  if(positional)
5162  return pname_;
5163 
5164  // Prefer long name
5165  if(!lnames_.empty())
5166  return std::string(2, '-') + lnames_[0];
5167 
5168  // Or short name if no long name
5169  if(!snames_.empty())
5170  return std::string(1, '-') + snames_[0];
5171 
5172  // If positional is the only name, it's okay to use that
5173  return pname_;
5174 }
5175 
5176 CLI11_INLINE void Option::run_callback() {
5177  if(force_callback_ && results_.empty()) {
5178  add_result(default_str_);
5179  }
5180  if(current_option_state_ == option_state::parsing) {
5181  _validate_results(results_);
5182  current_option_state_ = option_state::validated;
5183  }
5184 
5185  if(current_option_state_ < option_state::reduced) {
5186  _reduce_results(proc_results_, results_);
5187  current_option_state_ = option_state::reduced;
5188  }
5189  if(current_option_state_ >= option_state::reduced) {
5190  current_option_state_ = option_state::callback_run;
5191  if(!(callback_)) {
5192  return;
5193  }
5194  const results_t &send_results = proc_results_.empty() ? results_ : proc_results_;
5195  bool local_result = callback_(send_results);
5196 
5197  if(!local_result)
5198  throw ConversionError(get_name(), results_);
5199  }
5200 }
5201 
5202 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE const std::string &Option::matching_name(const Option &other) const {
5203  static const std::string estring;
5204  for(const std::string &sname : snames_)
5205  if(other.check_sname(sname))
5206  return sname;
5207  for(const std::string &lname : lnames_)
5208  if(other.check_lname(lname))
5209  return lname;
5210 
5211  if(ignore_case_ ||
5212  ignore_underscore_) { // We need to do the inverse, in case we are ignore_case or ignore underscore
5213  for(const std::string &sname : other.snames_)
5214  if(check_sname(sname))
5215  return sname;
5216  for(const std::string &lname : other.lnames_)
5217  if(check_lname(lname))
5218  return lname;
5219  }
5220  return estring;
5221 }
5222 
5223 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE bool Option::check_name(const std::string &name) const {
5224 
5225  if(name.length() > 2 && name[0] == '-' && name[1] == '-')
5226  return check_lname(name.substr(2));
5227  if(name.length() > 1 && name.front() == '-')
5228  return check_sname(name.substr(1));
5229  if(!pname_.empty()) {
5230  std::string local_pname = pname_;
5231  std::string local_name = name;
5232  if(ignore_underscore_) {
5233  local_pname = detail::remove_underscore(local_pname);
5234  local_name = detail::remove_underscore(local_name);
5235  }
5236  if(ignore_case_) {
5237  local_pname = detail::to_lower(local_pname);
5238  local_name = detail::to_lower(local_name);
5239  }
5240  if(local_name == local_pname) {
5241  return true;
5242  }
5243  }
5244 
5245  if(!envname_.empty()) {
5246  // this needs to be the original since envname_ shouldn't match on case insensitivity
5247  return (name == envname_);
5248  }
5249  return false;
5250 }
5251 
5252 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string Option::get_flag_value(const std::string &name,
5253  std::string input_value) const {
5254  static const std::string trueString{"true"};
5255  static const std::string falseString{"false"};
5256  static const std::string emptyString{"{}"};
5257  // check for disable flag override_
5258  if(disable_flag_override_) {
5259  if(!((input_value.empty()) || (input_value == emptyString))) {
5260  auto default_ind = detail::find_member(name, fnames_, ignore_case_, ignore_underscore_);
5261  if(default_ind >= 0) {
5262  // We can static cast this to std::size_t because it is more than 0 in this block
5263  if(default_flag_values_[static_cast<std::size_t>(default_ind)].second != input_value) {
5264  throw(ArgumentMismatch::FlagOverride(name));
5265  }
5266  } else {
5267  if(input_value != trueString) {
5268  throw(ArgumentMismatch::FlagOverride(name));
5269  }
5270  }
5271  }
5272  }
5273  auto ind = detail::find_member(name, fnames_, ignore_case_, ignore_underscore_);
5274  if((input_value.empty()) || (input_value == emptyString)) {
5275  if(flag_like_) {
5276  return (ind < 0) ? trueString : default_flag_values_[static_cast<std::size_t>(ind)].second;
5277  }
5278  return (ind < 0) ? default_str_ : default_flag_values_[static_cast<std::size_t>(ind)].second;
5279  }
5280  if(ind < 0) {
5281  return input_value;
5282  }
5283  if(default_flag_values_[static_cast<std::size_t>(ind)].second == falseString) {
5284  try {
5285  auto val = detail::to_flag_value(input_value);
5286  return (val == 1) ? falseString : (val == (-1) ? trueString : std::to_string(-val));
5287  } catch(const std::invalid_argument &) {
5288  return input_value;
5289  }
5290  } else {
5291  return input_value;
5292  }
5293 }
5294 
5295 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::add_result(std::string s) {
5296  _add_result(std::move(s), results_);
5297  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
5298  return this;
5299 }
5300 
5301 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::add_result(std::string s, int &results_added) {
5302  results_added = _add_result(std::move(s), results_);
5303  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
5304  return this;
5305 }
5306 
5307 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::add_result(std::vector<std::string> s) {
5308  current_option_state_ = option_state::parsing;
5309  for(auto &str : s) {
5310  _add_result(std::move(str), results_);
5311  }
5312  return this;
5313 }
5314 
5315 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE results_t Option::reduced_results() const {
5316  results_t res = proc_results_.empty() ? results_ : proc_results_;
5317  if(current_option_state_ < option_state::reduced) {
5318  if(current_option_state_ == option_state::parsing) {
5319  res = results_;
5320  _validate_results(res);
5321  }
5322  if(!res.empty()) {
5323  results_t extra;
5324  _reduce_results(extra, res);
5325  if(!extra.empty()) {
5326  res = std::move(extra);
5327  }
5328  }
5329  }
5330  return res;
5331 }
5332 
5333 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::type_size(int option_type_size) {
5334  if(option_type_size < 0) {
5335  // this section is included for backwards compatibility
5336  type_size_max_ = -option_type_size;
5337  type_size_min_ = -option_type_size;
5338  expected_max_ = detail::expected_max_vector_size;
5339  } else {
5340  type_size_max_ = option_type_size;
5341  if(type_size_max_ < detail::expected_max_vector_size) {
5342  type_size_min_ = option_type_size;
5343  } else {
5344  inject_separator_ = true;
5345  }
5346  if(type_size_max_ == 0)
5347  required_ = false;
5348  }
5349  return this;
5350 }
5351 
5352 CLI11_INLINE Option *Option::type_size(int option_type_size_min, int option_type_size_max) {
5353  if(option_type_size_min < 0 || option_type_size_max < 0) {
5354  // this section is included for backwards compatibility
5355  expected_max_ = detail::expected_max_vector_size;
5356  option_type_size_min = (std::abs)(option_type_size_min);
5357  option_type_size_max = (std::abs)(option_type_size_max);
5358  }
5359 
5360  if(option_type_size_min > option_type_size_max) {
5361  type_size_max_ = option_type_size_min;
5362  type_size_min_ = option_type_size_max;
5363  } else {
5364  type_size_min_ = option_type_size_min;
5365  type_size_max_ = option_type_size_max;
5366  }
5367  if(type_size_max_ == 0) {
5368  required_ = false;
5369  }
5370  if(type_size_max_ >= detail::expected_max_vector_size) {
5371  inject_separator_ = true;
5372  }
5373  return this;
5374 }
5375 
5376 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string Option::get_type_name() const {
5377  std::string full_type_name = type_name_();
5378  if(!validators_.empty()) {
5379  for(const auto &Validator : validators_) {
5380  std::string vtype = Validator.get_description();
5381  if(!vtype.empty()) {
5382  full_type_name += ":" + vtype;
5383  }
5384  }
5385  }
5386  return full_type_name;
5387 }
5388 
5389 CLI11_INLINE void Option::_validate_results(results_t &res) const {
5390  // Run the Validators (can change the string)
5391  if(!validators_.empty()) {
5392  if(type_size_max_ > 1) { // in this context index refers to the index in the type
5393  int index = 0;
5394  if(get_items_expected_max() < static_cast<int>(res.size()) &&
5395  multi_option_policy_ == CLI::MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast) {
5396  // create a negative index for the earliest ones
5397  index = get_items_expected_max() - static_cast<int>(res.size());
5398  }
5399 
5400  for(std::string &result : res) {
5401  if(detail::is_separator(result) && type_size_max_ != type_size_min_ && index >= 0) {
5402  index = 0; // reset index for variable size chunks
5403  continue;
5404  }
5405  auto err_msg = _validate(result, (index >= 0) ? (index % type_size_max_) : index);
5406  if(!err_msg.empty())
5407  throw ValidationError(get_name(), err_msg);
5408  ++index;
5409  }
5410  } else {
5411  int index = 0;
5412  if(expected_max_ < static_cast<int>(res.size()) &&
5413  multi_option_policy_ == CLI::MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast) {
5414  // create a negative index for the earliest ones
5415  index = expected_max_ - static_cast<int>(res.size());
5416  }
5417  for(std::string &result : res) {
5418  auto err_msg = _validate(result, index);
5419  ++index;
5420  if(!err_msg.empty())
5421  throw ValidationError(get_name(), err_msg);
5422  }
5423  }
5424  }
5425 }
5426 
5427 CLI11_INLINE void Option::_reduce_results(results_t &out, const results_t &original) const {
5428 
5429  // max num items expected or length of vector, always at least 1
5430  // Only valid for a trimming policy
5431 
5432  out.clear();
5433  // Operation depends on the policy setting
5434  switch(multi_option_policy_) {
5435  case MultiOptionPolicy::TakeAll:
5436  break;
5437  case MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast: {
5438  // Allow multi-option sizes (including 0)
5439  std::size_t trim_size = std::min<std::size_t>(
5440  static_cast<std::size_t>(std::max<int>(get_items_expected_max(), 1)), original.size());
5441  if(original.size() != trim_size) {
5442  out.assign(original.end() - static_cast<results_t::difference_type>(trim_size), original.end());
5443  }
5444  } break;
5445  case MultiOptionPolicy::TakeFirst: {
5446  std::size_t trim_size = std::min<std::size_t>(
5447  static_cast<std::size_t>(std::max<int>(get_items_expected_max(), 1)), original.size());
5448  if(original.size() != trim_size) {
5449  out.assign(original.begin(), original.begin() + static_cast<results_t::difference_type>(trim_size));
5450  }
5451  } break;
5452  case MultiOptionPolicy::Join:
5453  if(results_.size() > 1) {
5454  out.push_back(detail::join(original, std::string(1, (delimiter_ == '\0') ? '\n' : delimiter_)));
5455  }
5456  break;
5457  case MultiOptionPolicy::Sum:
5458  out.push_back(detail::sum_string_vector(original));
5459  break;
5460  case MultiOptionPolicy::Throw:
5461  default: {
5462  auto num_min = static_cast<std::size_t>(get_items_expected_min());
5463  auto num_max = static_cast<std::size_t>(get_items_expected_max());
5464  if(num_min == 0) {
5465  num_min = 1;
5466  }
5467  if(num_max == 0) {
5468  num_max = 1;
5469  }
5470  if(original.size() < num_min) {
5471  throw ArgumentMismatch::AtLeast(get_name(), static_cast<int>(num_min), original.size());
5472  }
5473  if(original.size() > num_max) {
5474  throw ArgumentMismatch::AtMost(get_name(), static_cast<int>(num_max), original.size());
5475  }
5476  break;
5477  }
5478  }
5479  // this check is to allow an empty vector in certain circumstances but not if expected is not zero.
5480  // {} is the indicator for an empty container
5481  if(out.empty()) {
5482  if(original.size() == 1 && original[0] == "{}" && get_items_expected_min() > 0) {
5483  out.push_back("{}");
5484  out.push_back("%%");
5485  }
5486  } else if(out.size() == 1 && out[0] == "{}" && get_items_expected_min() > 0) {
5487  out.push_back("%%");
5488  }
5489 }
5490 
5491 CLI11_INLINE std::string Option::_validate(std::string &result, int index) const {
5492  std::string err_msg;
5493  if(result.empty() && expected_min_ == 0) {
5494  // an empty with nothing expected is allowed
5495  return err_msg;
5496  }
5497  for(const auto &vali : validators_) {
5498  auto v = vali.get_application_index();
5499  if(v == -1 || v == index) {
5500  try {
5501  err_msg = vali(result);
5502  } catch(const ValidationError &err) {
5503  err_msg = err.what();
5504  }
5505  if(!err_msg.empty())
5506  break;
5507  }
5508  }
5509 
5510  return err_msg;
5511 }
5512 
5513 CLI11_INLINE int Option::_add_result(std::string &&result, std::vector<std::string> &res) const {
5514  int result_count = 0;
5515  if(allow_extra_args_ && !result.empty() && result.front() == '[' &&
5516  result.back() == ']') { // this is now a vector string likely from the default or user entry
5517  result.pop_back();
5518 
5519  for(auto &var : CLI::detail::split(result.substr(1), ',')) {
5520  if(!var.empty()) {
5521  result_count += _add_result(std::move(var), res);
5522  }
5523  }
5524  return result_count;
5525  }
5526  if(delimiter_ == '\0') {
5527  res.push_back(std::move(result));
5528  ++result_count;
5529  } else {
5530  if((result.find_first_of(delimiter_) != std::string::npos)) {
5531  for(const auto &var : CLI::detail::split(result, delimiter_)) {
5532  if(!var.empty()) {
5533  res.push_back(var);
5534  ++result_count;
5535  }
5536  }
5537  } else {
5538  res.push_back(std::move(result));
5539  ++result_count;
5540  }
5541  }
5542  return result_count;
5543 }
5544 
5545 
5546 
5547 #ifndef CLI11_PARSE
5548 #define CLI11_PARSE(app, argc, argv) \
5549  try { \
5550  (app).parse((argc), (argv)); \
5551  } catch(const CLI::ParseError &e) { \
5552  return (app).exit(e); \
5553  }
5554 #endif
5555 
5556 namespace detail {
5557 enum class Classifier { NONE, POSITIONAL_MARK, SHORT, LONG, WINDOWS_STYLE, SUBCOMMAND, SUBCOMMAND_TERMINATOR };
5558 struct AppFriend;
5559 } // namespace detail
5560 
5561 namespace FailureMessage {
5562 std::string simple(const App *app, const Error &e);
5563 std::string help(const App *app, const Error &e);
5564 } // namespace FailureMessage
5565 
5567 
5568 enum class config_extras_mode : char { error = 0, ignore, ignore_all, capture };
5569 
5570 class App;
5571 
5572 using App_p = std::shared_ptr<App>;
5573 
5574 namespace detail {
5576 
5577 template <typename T, enable_if_t<!std::is_integral<T>::value || (sizeof(T) <= 1U), detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
5578 Option *default_flag_modifiers(Option *opt) {
5579  return opt->always_capture_default();
5580 }
5581 
5583 template <typename T, enable_if_t<std::is_integral<T>::value && (sizeof(T) > 1U), detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
5584 Option *default_flag_modifiers(Option *opt) {
5585  return opt->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::Sum)->default_str("0")->force_callback();
5586 }
5587 
5588 } // namespace detail
5589

5800 
5802  explicit App(std::string app_description = "", std::string app_name = "")
5803  : App(app_description, app_name, nullptr) {
5804  set_help_flag("-h,--help", "Print this help message and exit");
5805  }
5806 
5807  App(const App &) = delete;
5808  App &operator=(const App &) = delete;
5809 
5811  virtual ~App() = default;
5812 
5819  App *callback(std::function<void()> app_callback) {
5820  if(immediate_callback_) {
5821  parse_complete_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
5822  } else {
5823  final_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
5824  }
5825  return this;
5826  }
5827 
5830  App *final_callback(std::function<void()> app_callback) {
5831  final_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
5832  return this;
5833  }
5834 
5837  App *parse_complete_callback(std::function<void()> pc_callback) {
5838  parse_complete_callback_ = std::move(pc_callback);
5839  return this;
5840  }
5841 
5844  App *preparse_callback(std::function<void(std::size_t)> pp_callback) {
5845  pre_parse_callback_ = std::move(pp_callback);
5846  return this;
5847  }
5848 
5850  App *name(std::string app_name = "");
5851 
5853  App *alias(std::string app_name);
5854 
5856  App *allow_extras(bool allow = true) {
5857  allow_extras_ = allow;
5858  return this;
5859  }
5860 
5862  App *required(bool require = true) {
5863  required_ = require;
5864  return this;
5865  }
5866

5869  disabled_ = disable;
5870  return this;
5871  }
5872 
5874  App *silent(bool silence = true) {
5875  silent_ = silence;
5876  return this;
5877  }
5878 
5880  App *disabled_by_default(bool disable = true) {
5881  if(disable) {
5882  default_startup = startup_mode::disabled;
5883  } else {
5884  default_startup = (default_startup == startup_mode::enabled) ? startup_mode::enabled : startup_mode::stable;
5885  }
5886  return this;
5887  }
5888 
5891  App *enabled_by_default(bool enable = true) {
5892  if(enable) {
5893  default_startup = startup_mode::enabled;
5894  } else {
5895  default_startup =
5896  (default_startup == startup_mode::disabled) ? startup_mode::disabled : startup_mode::stable;
5897  }
5898  return this;
5899  }
5900

5906  validate_positionals_ = validate;
5907  return this;
5908  }
5909

5912  validate_optional_arguments_ = validate;
5913  return this;
5914  }
5915 
5917  App *allow_config_extras(bool allow = true) {
5918  if(allow) {
5919  allow_config_extras_ = config_extras_mode::capture;
5920  allow_extras_ = true;
5921  } else {
5922  allow_config_extras_ = config_extras_mode::error;
5923  }
5924  return this;
5925  }
5926

5930  return this;
5931  }

5936  return this;
5937  }

5946  return this;
5947  }

5952  return this;
5953  }

5958  return this;
5959  }

5972  formatter_ = std::make_shared<FormatterLambda>(fmt);
5973  return this;

5978  config_formatter_ = fmt;
5979  return this;
5980  }
5981 
5983  CLI11_NODISCARD bool parsed() const { return parsed_ > 0; }
5984 
5986  OptionDefaults *option_defaults() { return &option_defaults_; }
5987 
5991 
6006  Option *add_option(std::string option_name,
6007  callback_t option_callback,
6008  std::string option_description = "",
6009  bool defaulted = false,
6010  std::function<std::string()> func = {});
6011 
6013  template <typename AssignTo,
6014  typename ConvertTo = AssignTo,
6015  enable_if_t<!std::is_const<ConvertTo>::value, detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6016  Option *add_option(std::string option_name,
6017  AssignTo &variable,
6018  std::string option_description = "") {
6019 
6020  auto fun = [&variable](const CLI::results_t &res) { // comment for spacing
6021  return detail::lexical_conversion<AssignTo, ConvertTo>(res, variable);
6022  };
6023 
6024  Option *opt = add_option(option_name, fun, option_description, false, [&variable]() {
6025  return CLI::detail::checked_to_string<AssignTo, ConvertTo>(variable);
6026  });
6027  opt->type_name(detail::type_name<ConvertTo>());
6028  // these must be actual lvalues since (std::max) sometimes is defined in terms of references and references
6029  // to structs used in the evaluation can be temporary so that would cause issues.
6030  auto Tcount = detail::type_count<AssignTo>::value;
6031  auto XCcount = detail::type_count<ConvertTo>::value;
6032  opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<ConvertTo>::value, (std::max)(Tcount, XCcount));
6033  opt->expected(detail::expected_count<ConvertTo>::value);
6034  opt->run_callback_for_default();
6035  return opt;
6036  }
6037 
6039  template <typename AssignTo, enable_if_t<!std::is_const<AssignTo>::value, detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6040  Option *add_option_no_stream(std::string option_name,
6041  AssignTo &variable,
6042  std::string option_description = "") {
6043 
6044  auto fun = [&variable](const CLI::results_t &res) { // comment for spacing
6045  return detail::lexical_conversion<AssignTo, AssignTo>(res, variable);
6046  };
6047 
6048  Option *opt = add_option(option_name, fun, option_description, false, []() { return std::string{}; });
6049  opt->type_name(detail::type_name<AssignTo>());
6050  opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<AssignTo>::value, detail::type_count<AssignTo>::value);
6051  opt->expected(detail::expected_count<AssignTo>::value);
6052  opt->run_callback_for_default();
6053  return opt;
6054  }
6055 
6057  template <typename ArgType>
6058  Option *add_option_function(std::string option_name,
6059  const std::function<void(const ArgType &)> &func,
6060  std::string option_description = "") {
6061 
6062  auto fun = [func](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6063  ArgType variable;
6064  bool result = detail::lexical_conversion<ArgType, ArgType>(res, variable);
6065  if(result) {
6066  func(variable);
6067  }
6068  return result;
6069  };
6070 
6071  Option *opt = add_option(option_name, std::move(fun), option_description, false);
6072  opt->type_name(detail::type_name<ArgType>());
6073  opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<ArgType>::value, detail::type_count<ArgType>::value);
6074  opt->expected(detail::expected_count<ArgType>::value);
6075  return opt;
6076  }
6077 
6079  Option *add_option(std::string option_name) {
6080  return add_option(option_name, CLI::callback_t{}, std::string{}, false);
6081  }
6082 
6084  template <typename T,
6085  enable_if_t<std::is_const<T>::value && std::is_constructible<std::string, T>::value, detail::enabler> =
6086  detail::dummy>
6087  Option *add_option(std::string option_name, T &option_description) {
6088  return add_option(option_name, CLI::callback_t(), option_description, false);
6089  }
6090 
6092  Option *set_help_flag(std::string flag_name = "", const std::string &help_description = "");
6093 
6095  Option *set_help_all_flag(std::string help_name = "", const std::string &help_description = "");
6096 
6098  Option *set_version_flag(std::string flag_name = "",
6099  const std::string &versionString = "",
6100  const std::string &version_help = "Display program version information and exit");
6101 
6103  Option *set_version_flag(std::string flag_name,
6104  std::function<std::string()> vfunc,
6105  const std::string &version_help = "Display program version information and exit");
6106 
6107  private:
6109  Option *_add_flag_internal(std::string flag_name, CLI::callback_t fun, std::string flag_description);
6110 
6111  public:
6113  Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name) { return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, CLI::callback_t(), std::string{}); }
6114 
6118  template <typename T,
6119  enable_if_t<std::is_const<T>::value && std::is_constructible<std::string, T>::value, detail::enabler> =
6120  detail::dummy>
6121  Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name, T &flag_description) {
6122  return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, CLI::callback_t(), flag_description);
6123  }
6124 
6127  template <typename T,
6128  enable_if_t<!detail::is_mutable_container<T>::value && !std::is_const<T>::value &&
6129  !std::is_constructible<std::function<void(int)>, T>::value,
6130  detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6131  Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name,
6132  T &flag_result,
6133  std::string flag_description = "") {
6134 
6135  CLI::callback_t fun = [&flag_result](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6136  return CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], flag_result);
6137  };
6138  auto *opt = _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description));
6139  return detail::default_flag_modifiers<T>(opt);
6140  }
6141 
6143  template <typename T,
6144  enable_if_t<!std::is_assignable<std::function<void(std::int64_t)> &, T>::value, detail::enabler> =
6145  detail::dummy>
6146  Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name,
6147  std::vector<T> &flag_results,
6148  std::string flag_description = "") {
6149  CLI::callback_t fun = [&flag_results](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6150  bool retval = true;
6151  for(const auto &elem : res) {
6152  flag_results.emplace_back();
6153  retval &= detail::lexical_cast(elem, flag_results.back());
6154  }
6155  return retval;
6156  };
6157  return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description))
6158  ->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeAll)
6159  ->run_callback_for_default();
6160  }
6161 
6163  Option *add_flag_callback(std::string flag_name,
6164  std::function<void(void)> function,
6165  std::string flag_description = "");
6166 
6168  Option *add_flag_function(std::string flag_name,
6169  std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
6170  std::string flag_description = "");
6171 
6172 #ifdef CLI11_CPP14
6174  Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name,
6175  std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
6176  std::string flag_description = "") {
6177  return add_flag_function(std::move(flag_name), std::move(function), std::move(flag_description));
6178  }
6179 #endif
6180 
6182  Option *set_config(std::string option_name = "",
6183  std::string default_filename = "",
6184  const std::string &help_message = "Read an ini file",
6185  bool config_required = false);
6186 
6188  bool remove_option(Option *opt);
6189 
6191  template <typename T = Option_group>
6192  T *add_option_group(std::string group_name, std::string group_description = "") {
6193  if(!detail::valid_alias_name_string(group_name)) {
6194  throw IncorrectConstruction("option group names may not contain newlines or null characters");
6195  }
6196  auto option_group = std::make_shared<T>(std::move(group_description), group_name, this);
6197  auto *ptr = option_group.get();
6198  // move to App_p for overload resolution on older gcc versions
6199  App_p app_ptr = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<App>(option_group);
6200  add_subcommand(std::move(app_ptr));
6201  return ptr;
6202  }
6203 
6207 
6209  App *add_subcommand(std::string subcommand_name = "", std::string subcommand_description = "");
6210 
6212  App *add_subcommand(CLI::App_p subcom);
6213 
6215  bool remove_subcommand(App *subcom);
6216 
6219  App *get_subcommand(const App *subcom) const;
6220 
6222  CLI11_NODISCARD App *get_subcommand(std::string subcom) const;
6223 
6225  CLI11_NODISCARD App *get_subcommand(int index = 0) const;
6226 
6228  CLI::App_p get_subcommand_ptr(App *subcom) const;
6229 
6231  CLI11_NODISCARD CLI::App_p get_subcommand_ptr(std::string subcom) const;
6232 
6234  CLI11_NODISCARD CLI::App_p get_subcommand_ptr(int index = 0) const;
6235 
6237  CLI11_NODISCARD App *get_option_group(std::string group_name) const;
6238 
6242  CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t count() const { return parsed_; }
6243 
6246  CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t count_all() const;
6247 
6249  App *group(std::string group_name) {
6250  group_ = group_name;
6251  return this;
6252  }
6253 
6255  App *require_subcommand() {
6256  require_subcommand_min_ = 1;
6257  require_subcommand_max_ = 0;
6258  return this;
6259  }
6260 
6264  App *require_subcommand(int value) {
6265  if(value < 0) {
6266  require_subcommand_min_ = 0;
6267  require_subcommand_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(-value);
6268  } else {
6269  require_subcommand_min_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6270  require_subcommand_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6271  }
6272  return this;
6273  }
6274 
6277  App *require_subcommand(std::size_t min, std::size_t max) {
6278  require_subcommand_min_ = min;
6279  require_subcommand_max_ = max;
6280  return this;
6281  }
6282 
6284  App *require_option() {
6285  require_option_min_ = 1;
6286  require_option_max_ = 0;
6287  return this;
6288  }
6289 
6293  App *require_option(int value) {
6294  if(value < 0) {
6295  require_option_min_ = 0;
6296  require_option_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(-value);
6297  } else {
6298  require_option_min_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6299  require_option_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6300  }
6301  return this;
6302  }
6303 
6306  App *require_option(std::size_t min, std::size_t max) {
6307  require_option_min_ = min;
6308  require_option_max_ = max;
6309  return this;
6310  }
6311 
6314  App *fallthrough(bool value = true) {
6315  fallthrough_ = value;
6316  return this;
6317  }
6318 
6321  explicit operator bool() const { return parsed_ > 0; }
6322

6361  }

6386  bool got_subcommand(const App *subcom) const {
6387  // get subcom needed to verify that this was a real subcommand
6388  return get_subcommand(subcom)->parsed_ > 0;
6389  }
6390

6393  return get_subcommand(subcommand_name)->parsed_ > 0;
6394  }
6395 
6397  App *excludes(Option *opt) {
6398  if(opt == nullptr) {
6399  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6400  }
6401  exclude_options_.insert(opt);
6402  return this;
6403  }
6404 
6406  App *excludes(App *app) {
6407  if(app == nullptr) {
6408  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6409  }
6410  if(app == this) {
6411  throw OptionNotFound("cannot self reference in needs");
6412  }
6413  auto res = exclude_subcommands_.insert(app);
6414  // subcommand exclusion should be symmetric
6415  if(res.second) {
6416  app->exclude_subcommands_.insert(this);
6417  }
6418  return this;
6419  }
6420 
6421  App *needs(Option *opt) {
6422  if(opt == nullptr) {
6423  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6424  }
6425  need_options_.insert(opt);
6426  return this;
6427  }
6428 
6429  App *needs(App *app) {
6430  if(app == nullptr) {
6431  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6432  }
6433  if(app == this) {
6434  throw OptionNotFound("cannot self reference in needs");
6435  }
6436  need_subcommands_.insert(app);
6437  return this;
6438  }
6439 
6441  bool remove_excludes(Option *opt);
6442 
6444  bool remove_excludes(App *app);
6445 
6447  bool remove_needs(Option *opt);
6448 
6450  bool remove_needs(App *app);
6454

6457  footer_ = std::move(footer_string);
6458  return this;
6459  }
6461  App *footer(std::function<std::string()> footer_function) {
6462  footer_callback_ = std::move(footer_function);
6463  return this;
6464  }
6467  CLI11_NODISCARD std::string config_to_str(bool default_also = false, bool write_description = false) const {
6468  return config_formatter_->to_config(this, default_also, write_description, "");
6469  }

6483 
6485  CLI11_NODISCARD std::shared_ptr<Config> get_config_formatter() const { return config_formatter_; }
6486 
6488  CLI11_NODISCARD std::shared_ptr<ConfigBase> get_config_formatter_base() const {
6489  // This is safer as a dynamic_cast if we have RTTI, as Config -> ConfigBase
6490 #if CLI11_USE_STATIC_RTTI == 0
6491  return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ConfigBase>(config_formatter_);
6492 #else
6493  return std::static_pointer_cast<ConfigBase>(config_formatter_);
6494 #endif
6495  }

6504  }

6513  Option *get_option_no_throw(std::string option_name) noexcept;
6514 
6516  CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_option_no_throw(std::string option_name) const noexcept;
6517 
6519  CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_option(std::string option_name) const {
6520  const auto *opt = get_option_no_throw(option_name);
6521  if(opt == nullptr) {
6522  throw OptionNotFound(option_name);
6523  }
6524  return opt;
6525  }
6526 
6528  Option *get_option(std::string option_name) {
6529  auto *opt = get_option_no_throw(option_name);
6530  if(opt == nullptr) {
6531  throw OptionNotFound(option_name);
6532  }
6533  return opt;
6534  }

6600 
6602  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_enabled_by_default() const { return (default_startup == startup_mode::enabled); }

6606  CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_validate_optional_arguments() const { return validate_optional_arguments_; }

6782  CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &_compare_subcommand_names(const App &subcom, const App &base) const;

6785  void _move_to_missing(detail::Classifier val_type, const std::string &val);

6789  void _move_option(Option *opt, App *app);
6790 }; // namespace CLI
6791 
6793 class Option_group : public App {
6794  public:
6795  Option_group(std::string group_description, std::string group_name, App *parent)
6796  : App(std::move(group_description), "", parent) {
6797  group(group_name);
6798  // option groups should have automatic fallthrough
6799  }
6800  using App::add_option;
6802  Option *add_option(Option *opt) {
6803  if(get_parent() == nullptr) {
6804  throw OptionNotFound("Unable to locate the specified option");
6805  }
6806  get_parent()->_move_option(opt, this);
6807  return opt;
6808  }
6810  void add_options(Option *opt) { add_option(opt); }
6812  template <typename... Args> void add_options(Option *opt, Args... args) {
6813  add_option(opt);
6814  add_options(args...);
6815  }
6816  using App::add_subcommand;
6818  App *add_subcommand(App *subcom) {
6819  App_p subc = subcom->get_parent()->get_subcommand_ptr(subcom);
6820  subc->get_parent()->remove_subcommand(subcom);
6821  add_subcommand(std::move(subc));
6822  return subcom;
6823  }
6824 };
6825 
6827 CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOn(App *trigger_app, App *app_to_enable);
6828 
6830 CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOn(App *trigger_app, std::vector<App *> apps_to_enable);
6831 
6833 CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOff(App *trigger_app, App *app_to_enable);
6834 
6836 CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOff(App *trigger_app, std::vector<App *> apps_to_enable);
6837 
6839 CLI11_INLINE void deprecate_option(Option *opt, const std::string &replacement = "");
6840 
6842 inline void deprecate_option(App *app, const std::string &option_name, const std::string &replacement = "") {
6843  auto *opt = app->get_option(option_name);
6844  deprecate_option(opt, replacement);
6845 }
6846 
6848 inline void deprecate_option(App &app, const std::string &option_name, const std::string &replacement = "") {
6849  auto *opt = app.get_option(option_name);
6850  deprecate_option(opt, replacement);
6851 }

6865 namespace FailureMessage {
6866 
6868 CLI11_INLINE std::string simple(const App *app, const Error &e);

6871 CLI11_INLINE std::string help(const App *app, const Error &e);

6874 
6875 namespace detail {
6877 struct AppFriend {
6878 #ifdef CLI11_CPP14
6879 
6881  template <typename... Args> static decltype(auto) parse_arg(App *app, Args &&...args) {
6882  return app->_parse_arg(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6883  }
6884 
6886  template <typename... Args> static decltype(auto) parse_subcommand(App *app, Args &&...args) {
6887  return app->_parse_subcommand(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6888  }
6889 #else
6891  template <typename... Args>
6892  static auto parse_arg(App *app, Args &&...args) ->
6893  typename std::result_of<decltype (&App::_parse_arg)(App, Args...)>::type {
6894  return app->_parse_arg(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6895  }
6896 
6898  template <typename... Args>
6899  static auto parse_subcommand(App *app, Args &&...args) ->
6900  typename std::result_of<decltype (&App::_parse_subcommand)(App, Args...)>::type {
6901  return app->_parse_subcommand(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
6902  }
6903 #endif
6905  static App *get_fallthrough_parent(App *app) { return app->_get_fallthrough_parent(); }
6906 };
6907 } // namespace detail
6908 
6909 
6910 
6911 
6912 CLI11_INLINE App::App(std::string app_description, std::string app_name, App *parent)
6913  : name_(std::move(app_name)), description_(std::move(app_description)), parent_(parent) {
6914  // Inherit if not from a nullptr
6915  if(parent_ != nullptr) {
6916  if(parent_->help_ptr_ != nullptr)
6917  set_help_flag(parent_->help_ptr_->get_name(false, true), parent_->help_ptr_->get_description());
6918  if(parent_->help_all_ptr_ != nullptr)
6919  set_help_all_flag(parent_->help_all_ptr_->get_name(false, true), parent_->help_all_ptr_->get_description());
6920 
6922  option_defaults_ = parent_->option_defaults_;
6923 
6924  // INHERITABLE
6925  failure_message_ = parent_->failure_message_;
6926  allow_extras_ = parent_->allow_extras_;
6927  allow_config_extras_ = parent_->allow_config_extras_;
6928  prefix_command_ = parent_->prefix_command_;
6929  immediate_callback_ = parent_->immediate_callback_;
6930  ignore_case_ = parent_->ignore_case_;
6931  ignore_underscore_ = parent_->ignore_underscore_;
6932  fallthrough_ = parent_->fallthrough_;
6933  validate_positionals_ = parent_->validate_positionals_;
6934  validate_optional_arguments_ = parent_->validate_optional_arguments_;
6935  configurable_ = parent_->configurable_;
6936  allow_windows_style_options_ = parent_->allow_windows_style_options_;
6937  group_ = parent_->group_;
6938  footer_ = parent_->footer_;
6939  formatter_ = parent_->formatter_;
6940  config_formatter_ = parent_->config_formatter_;
6941  require_subcommand_max_ = parent_->require_subcommand_max_;
6942  }
6943 }
6944 
6945 CLI11_INLINE App *App::name(std::string app_name) {
6946 
6947  if(parent_ != nullptr) {
6948  auto oname = name_;
6949  name_ = app_name;
6950  const auto &res = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *_get_fallthrough_parent());
6951  if(!res.empty()) {
6952  name_ = oname;
6953  throw(OptionAlreadyAdded(app_name + " conflicts with existing subcommand names"));
6954  }
6955  } else {
6956  name_ = app_name;
6957  }
6958  has_automatic_name_ = false;
6959  return this;
6960 }
6961 
6962 CLI11_INLINE App *App::alias(std::string app_name) {
6963  if(app_name.empty() || !detail::valid_alias_name_string(app_name)) {
6964  throw IncorrectConstruction("Aliases may not be empty or contain newlines or null characters");
6965  }
6966  if(parent_ != nullptr) {
6967  aliases_.push_back(app_name);
6968  const auto &res = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *_get_fallthrough_parent());
6969  if(!res.empty()) {
6970  aliases_.pop_back();
6971  throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("alias already matches an existing subcommand: " + app_name));
6972  }
6973  } else {
6974  aliases_.push_back(app_name);
6975  }
6976 
6977  return this;
6978 }
6979 
6980 CLI11_INLINE App *App::immediate_callback(bool immediate) {
6981  immediate_callback_ = immediate;
6982  if(immediate_callback_) {
6983  if(final_callback_ && !(parse_complete_callback_)) {
6984  std::swap(final_callback_, parse_complete_callback_);
6985  }
6986  } else if(!(final_callback_) && parse_complete_callback_) {
6987  std::swap(final_callback_, parse_complete_callback_);
6988  }
6989  return this;
6990 }
6991 
6992 CLI11_INLINE App *App::ignore_case(bool value) {
6993  if(value && !ignore_case_) {
6994  ignore_case_ = true;
6995  auto *p = (parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
6996  const auto &match = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *p);
6997  if(!match.empty()) {
6998  ignore_case_ = false; // we are throwing so need to be exception invariant
6999  throw OptionAlreadyAdded("ignore case would cause subcommand name conflicts: " + match);
7000  }
7001  }
7002  ignore_case_ = value;
7003  return this;
7004 }
7005 
7006 CLI11_INLINE App *App::ignore_underscore(bool value) {
7007  if(value && !ignore_underscore_) {
7008  ignore_underscore_ = true;
7009  auto *p = (parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
7010  const auto &match = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *p);
7011  if(!match.empty()) {
7012  ignore_underscore_ = false;
7013  throw OptionAlreadyAdded("ignore underscore would cause subcommand name conflicts: " + match);
7014  }
7015  }
7016  ignore_underscore_ = value;
7017  return this;
7018 }
7019 
7020 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::add_option(std::string option_name,
7021  callback_t option_callback,
7022  std::string option_description,
7023  bool defaulted,
7024  std::function<std::string()> func) {
7025  Option myopt{option_name, option_description, option_callback, this};
7026 
7027  if(std::find_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), [&myopt](const Option_p &v) { return *v == myopt; }) ==
7028  std::end(options_)) {
7029  options_.emplace_back();
7030  Option_p &option = options_.back();
7031  option.reset(new Option(option_name, option_description, option_callback, this));
7032 
7033  // Set the default string capture function
7034  option->default_function(func);
7035 
7036  // For compatibility with CLI11 1.7 and before, capture the default string here
7037  if(defaulted)
7038  option->capture_default_str();
7039 
7040  // Transfer defaults to the new option
7041  option_defaults_.copy_to(option.get());
7042 
7043  // Don't bother to capture if we already did
7044  if(!defaulted && option->get_always_capture_default())
7045  option->capture_default_str();
7046 
7047  return option.get();
7048  }
7049  // we know something matches now find what it is so we can produce more error information
7050  for(auto &opt : options_) {
7051  const auto &matchname = opt->matching_name(myopt);
7052  if(!matchname.empty()) {
7053  throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("added option matched existing option name: " + matchname));
7054  }
7055  }
7056  // this line should not be reached the above loop should trigger the throw
7057  throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("added option matched existing option name")); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7058 }
7059 
7060 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_help_flag(std::string flag_name, const std::string &help_description) {
7061  // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to help_description
7062  if(help_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7063  remove_option(help_ptr_);
7064  help_ptr_ = nullptr;
7065  }
7066 
7067  // Empty name will simply remove the help flag
7068  if(!flag_name.empty()) {
7069  help_ptr_ = add_flag(flag_name, help_description);
7070  help_ptr_->configurable(false);
7071  }
7072 
7073  return help_ptr_;
7074 }
7075 
7076 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_help_all_flag(std::string help_name, const std::string &help_description) {
7077  // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to flag_description
7078  if(help_all_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7079  remove_option(help_all_ptr_);
7080  help_all_ptr_ = nullptr;
7081  }
7082 
7083  // Empty name will simply remove the help all flag
7084  if(!help_name.empty()) {
7085  help_all_ptr_ = add_flag(help_name, help_description);
7086  help_all_ptr_->configurable(false);
7087  }
7088 
7089  return help_all_ptr_;
7090 }
7091 
7092 CLI11_INLINE Option *
7093 App::set_version_flag(std::string flag_name, const std::string &versionString, const std::string &version_help) {
7094  // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to version_description
7095  if(version_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7096  remove_option(version_ptr_);
7097  version_ptr_ = nullptr;
7098  }
7099 
7100  // Empty name will simply remove the version flag
7101  if(!flag_name.empty()) {
7102  version_ptr_ = add_flag_callback(
7103  flag_name, [versionString]() { throw(CLI::CallForVersion(versionString, 0)); }, version_help);
7104  version_ptr_->configurable(false);
7105  }
7106 
7107  return version_ptr_;
7108 }
7109 
7110 CLI11_INLINE Option *
7111 App::set_version_flag(std::string flag_name, std::function<std::string()> vfunc, const std::string &version_help) {
7112  if(version_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7113  remove_option(version_ptr_);
7114  version_ptr_ = nullptr;
7115  }
7116 
7117  // Empty name will simply remove the version flag
7118  if(!flag_name.empty()) {
7119  version_ptr_ = add_flag_callback(
7120  flag_name, [vfunc]() { throw(CLI::CallForVersion(vfunc(), 0)); }, version_help);
7121  version_ptr_->configurable(false);
7122  }
7123 
7124  return version_ptr_;
7125 }
7126 
7127 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::_add_flag_internal(std::string flag_name, CLI::callback_t fun, std::string flag_description) {
7128  Option *opt = nullptr;
7129  if(detail::has_default_flag_values(flag_name)) {
7130  // check for default values and if it has them
7131  auto flag_defaults = detail::get_default_flag_values(flag_name);
7132  detail::remove_default_flag_values(flag_name);
7133  opt = add_option(std::move(flag_name), std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description), false);
7134  for(const auto &fname : flag_defaults)
7135  opt->fnames_.push_back(fname.first);
7136  opt->default_flag_values_ = std::move(flag_defaults);
7137  } else {
7138  opt = add_option(std::move(flag_name), std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description), false);
7139  }
7140  // flags cannot have positional values
7141  if(opt->get_positional()) {
7142  auto pos_name = opt->get_name(true);
7143  remove_option(opt);
7144  throw IncorrectConstruction::PositionalFlag(pos_name);
7145  }
7146  opt->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast);
7147  opt->expected(0);
7148  opt->required(false);
7149  return opt;
7150 }
7151 
7152 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::add_flag_callback(std::string flag_name,
7153  std::function<void(void)> function,
7154  std::string flag_description) {
7155 
7156  CLI::callback_t fun = [function](const CLI::results_t &res) {
7157  bool trigger{false};
7158  auto result = CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], trigger);
7159  if(result && trigger) {
7160  function();
7161  }
7162  return result;
7163  };
7164  return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description));
7165 }
7166 
7167 CLI11_INLINE Option *
7168 App::add_flag_function(std::string flag_name,
7169  std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
7170  std::string flag_description) {
7171 
7172  CLI::callback_t fun = [function](const CLI::results_t &res) {
7173  std::int64_t flag_count{0};
7174  CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], flag_count);
7175  function(flag_count);
7176  return true;
7177  };
7178  return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description))
7179  ->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::Sum);
7180 }
7181 
7182 CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_config(std::string option_name,
7183  std::string default_filename,
7184  const std::string &help_message,
7185  bool config_required) {
7186 
7187  // Remove existing config if present
7188  if(config_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7189  remove_option(config_ptr_);
7190  config_ptr_ = nullptr; // need to remove the config_ptr completely
7191  }
7192 
7193  // Only add config if option passed
7194  if(!option_name.empty()) {
7195  config_ptr_ = add_option(option_name, help_message);
7196  if(config_required) {
7197  config_ptr_->required();
7198  }
7199  if(!default_filename.empty()) {
7200  config_ptr_->default_str(std::move(default_filename));
7201  }
7202  config_ptr_->configurable(false);
7203  }
7204 
7205  return config_ptr_;
7206 }
7207 
7208 CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_option(Option *opt) {
7209  // Make sure no links exist
7210  for(Option_p &op : options_) {
7211  op->remove_needs(opt);
7212  op->remove_excludes(opt);
7213  }
7214 
7215  if(help_ptr_ == opt)
7216  help_ptr_ = nullptr;
7217  if(help_all_ptr_ == opt)
7218  help_all_ptr_ = nullptr;
7219 
7220  auto iterator =
7221  std::find_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), [opt](const Option_p &v) { return v.get() == opt; });
7222  if(iterator != std::end(options_)) {
7223  options_.erase(iterator);
7224  return true;
7225  }
7226  return false;
7227 }
7228 
7229 CLI11_INLINE App *App::add_subcommand(std::string subcommand_name, std::string subcommand_description) {
7230  if(!subcommand_name.empty() && !detail::valid_name_string(subcommand_name)) {
7231  if(!detail::valid_first_char(subcommand_name[0])) {
7232  throw IncorrectConstruction("Subcommand name starts with invalid character, '!' and '-' are not allowed");
7233  }
7234  for(auto c : subcommand_name) {
7235  if(!detail::valid_later_char(c)) {
7236  throw IncorrectConstruction(std::string("Subcommand name contains invalid character ('") + c +
7237  "'), all characters are allowed except"
7238  "'=',':','{','}', and ' '");
7239  }
7240  }
7241  }
7242  CLI::App_p subcom = std::shared_ptr<App>(new App(std::move(subcommand_description), subcommand_name, this));
7243  return add_subcommand(std::move(subcom));
7244 }
7245 
7246 CLI11_INLINE App *App::add_subcommand(CLI::App_p subcom) {
7247  if(!subcom)
7248  throw IncorrectConstruction("passed App is not valid");
7249  auto *ckapp = (name_.empty() && parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
7250  const auto &mstrg = _compare_subcommand_names(*subcom, *ckapp);
7251  if(!mstrg.empty()) {
7252  throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("subcommand name or alias matches existing subcommand: " + mstrg));
7253  }
7254  subcom->parent_ = this;
7255  subcommands_.push_back(std::move(subcom));
7256  return subcommands_.back().get();
7257 }
7258 
7259 CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_subcommand(App *subcom) {
7260  // Make sure no links exist
7261  for(App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
7262  sub->remove_excludes(subcom);
7263  sub->remove_needs(subcom);
7264  }
7265 
7266  auto iterator = std::find_if(
7267  std::begin(subcommands_), std::end(subcommands_), [subcom](const App_p &v) { return v.get() == subcom; });
7268  if(iterator != std::end(subcommands_)) {
7269  subcommands_.erase(iterator);
7270  return true;
7271  }
7272  return false;
7273 }
7274 
7275 CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(const App *subcom) const {
7276  if(subcom == nullptr)
7277  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
7278  for(const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7279  if(subcomptr.get() == subcom)
7280  return subcomptr.get();
7281  throw OptionNotFound(subcom->get_name());
7282 }
7283 
7284 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(std::string subcom) const {
7285  auto *subc = _find_subcommand(subcom, false, false);
7286  if(subc == nullptr)
7287  throw OptionNotFound(subcom);
7288  return subc;
7289 }
7290 
7291 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(int index) const {
7292  if(index >= 0) {
7293  auto uindex = static_cast<unsigned>(index);
7294  if(uindex < subcommands_.size())
7295  return subcommands_[uindex].get();
7296  }
7297  throw OptionNotFound(std::to_string(index));
7298 }
7299 
7300 CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(App *subcom) const {
7301  if(subcom == nullptr)
7302  throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
7303  for(const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7304  if(subcomptr.get() == subcom)
7305  return subcomptr;
7306  throw OptionNotFound(subcom->get_name());
7307 }
7308 
7309 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(std::string subcom) const {
7310  for(const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7311  if(subcomptr->check_name(subcom))
7312  return subcomptr;
7313  throw OptionNotFound(subcom);
7314 }
7315 
7316 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(int index) const {
7317  if(index >= 0) {
7318  auto uindex = static_cast<unsigned>(index);
7319  if(uindex < subcommands_.size())
7320  return subcommands_[uindex];
7321  }
7322  throw OptionNotFound(std::to_string(index));
7323 }
7324 
7325 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App *App::get_option_group(std::string group_name) const {
7326  for(const App_p &app : subcommands_) {
7327  if(app->name_.empty() && app->group_ == group_name) {
7328  return app.get();
7329  }
7330  }
7331  throw OptionNotFound(group_name);
7332 }
7333 
7334 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::size_t App::count_all() const {
7335  std::size_t cnt{0};
7336  for(const auto &opt : options_) {
7337  cnt += opt->count();
7338  }
7339  for(const auto &sub : subcommands_) {
7340  cnt += sub->count_all();
7341  }
7342  if(!get_name().empty()) { // for named subcommands add the number of times the subcommand was called
7343  cnt += parsed_;
7344  }
7345  return cnt;
7346 }
7347 
7348 CLI11_INLINE void App::clear() {
7349 
7350  parsed_ = 0;
7351  pre_parse_called_ = false;
7352 
7353  missing_.clear();
7354  parsed_subcommands_.clear();
7355  for(const Option_p &opt : options_) {
7356  opt->clear();
7357  }
7358  for(const App_p &subc : subcommands_) {
7359  subc->clear();
7360  }
7361 }
7362 
7363 CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(int argc, const char *const *argv) {
7364  // If the name is not set, read from command line
7365  if(name_.empty() || has_automatic_name_) {
7366  has_automatic_name_ = true;
7367  name_ = argv[0];
7368  }
7369 
7370  std::vector<std::string> args;
7371  args.reserve(static_cast<std::size_t>(argc) - 1U);
7372  for(auto i = static_cast<std::size_t>(argc) - 1U; i > 0U; --i)
7373  args.emplace_back(argv[i]);
7374  parse(std::move(args));
7375 }
7376 
7377 CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::string commandline, bool program_name_included) {
7378 
7379  if(program_name_included) {
7380  auto nstr = detail::split_program_name(commandline);
7381  if((name_.empty()) || (has_automatic_name_)) {
7382  has_automatic_name_ = true;
7383  name_ = nstr.first;
7384  }
7385  commandline = std::move(nstr.second);
7386  } else {
7387  detail::trim(commandline);
7388  }
7389  // the next section of code is to deal with quoted arguments after an '=' or ':' for windows like operations
7390  if(!commandline.empty()) {
7391  commandline = detail::find_and_modify(commandline, "=", detail::escape_detect);
7392  if(allow_windows_style_options_)
7393  commandline = detail::find_and_modify(commandline, ":", detail::escape_detect);
7394  }
7395 
7396  auto args = detail::split_up(std::move(commandline));
7397  // remove all empty strings
7398  args.erase(std::remove(args.begin(), args.end(), std::string{}), args.end());
7399  std::reverse(args.begin(), args.end());
7400 
7401  parse(std::move(args));
7402 }
7403 
7404 CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::vector<std::string> &args) {
7405  // Clear if parsed
7406  if(parsed_ > 0)
7407  clear();
7408 
7409  // parsed_ is incremented in commands/subcommands,
7410  // but placed here to make sure this is cleared when
7411  // running parse after an error is thrown, even by _validate or _configure.
7412  parsed_ = 1;
7413  _validate();
7414  _configure();
7415  // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7416  parent_ = nullptr;
7417  parsed_ = 0;
7418 
7419  _parse(args);
7420  run_callback();
7421 }
7422 
7423 CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::vector<std::string> &&args) {
7424  // Clear if parsed
7425  if(parsed_ > 0)
7426  clear();
7427 
7428  // parsed_ is incremented in commands/subcommands,
7429  // but placed here to make sure this is cleared when
7430  // running parse after an error is thrown, even by _validate or _configure.
7431  parsed_ = 1;
7432  _validate();
7433  _configure();
7434  // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7435  parent_ = nullptr;
7436  parsed_ = 0;
7437 
7438  _parse(std::move(args));
7439  run_callback();
7440 }
7441 
7442 CLI11_INLINE void App::parse_from_stream(std::istream &input) {
7443  if(parsed_ == 0) {
7444  _validate();
7445  _configure();
7446  // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7447  }
7448 
7449  _parse_stream(input);
7450  run_callback();
7451 }
7452 
7453 CLI11_INLINE int App::exit(const Error &e, std::ostream &out, std::ostream &err) const {
7454 
7456  if(e.get_name() == "RuntimeError")
7457  return e.get_exit_code();
7458 
7459  if(e.get_name() == "CallForHelp") {
7460  out << help();
7461  return e.get_exit_code();
7462  }
7463 
7464  if(e.get_name() == "CallForAllHelp") {
7465  out << help("", AppFormatMode::All);
